review: Thrilled with all the free content.
author: EO

review: Totally rocks!  WAY better then Chrome Cast, (thought it does have it +'s)
author: Sigma Wolf

review: Very good, easy to install, easy to operate. Will recommend to buy it to anyone.
author: Ivan

review: Great Product!Perfect for HDTV's and has games for young kids!
author: Aniya Settles

review: Amazon really did this one right!  Super solid and stable OS.  Very powerful with no lag.  I use Plex as my main media center and with the app being available on the Fire Stick it makes it an ultra portable media player.  Amazon Prime videos & music is also a huge perk!
author: S. MANNING

review: So far, we are not happy with the fire stick. We received it yesterday and nothing seems to work properly. My 10 yr old is having more patients than I am. I have changed the password 3 times because none of them are working. Yes, we are connected to my wifi and set up according to the instructions. If things change I may change my review. But as of right now, not impressed!
author: Kelly

review: My family loves this. I wasn't fully using my Prime privileges because we didn't have a TV that would work with the movies. Now I can. Plus, the movies that aren't free are cheaper than Uverse. Loved the (free) Amazon series, "Catastrophe." The stick was easy to install and simple to work.
author: Sara L. Ornelas

review: As a Prime member this is a great product for the price.Program selection and ease of finding show is great.  Not so great the tiny remote.Also I have found the sound quality is low.  Have to put volume at loudest to barely hear most shows.
author: Starbritefla
